title: Adigvcdh
author: Adigvcdh
content: I am the author of an idea that I believe will revolutionize the future of cryptocurrencies and technology. The project I am working on is a combination of artificial intelligence, space exploration and blockchain. We are looking at opportunities for collaboration and partnership.If you are passionate about the idea of the future, believe that technology should keep pace with progress, and are willing to share your experience and ideas, I am looking for partners willing to join our project.To contact me, write a message on the forum or in Telegram @di4xod.

comments.author: vanturhan82
comments.body: If you're interested in collaboration, you can share some information about your project in your post. This way, people can see why they should connect with you via Telegram. Personally, I also need to see some appeal in the project before messaging you through Telegram. If it's just a collaboration in the usual investment field, there are many projects involving artificial intelligence out there that I find intriguing.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Adigvcdh on November 20, 2023, 10:26:10 PMI am the author of an idea that I believe will revolutionize the future of cryptocurrencies and technology. The project I am working on is a combination of artificial intelligence, space exploration and blockchain. We are looking at opportunities for collaboration and partnership.Strategic partner meaning financially partner or someone who have experience too on developing project and codes. Partnetship is easy if you know what you want. There are lots of people here might be interested like in a form of marketing, investors or someone love to code and found buggy things on a platform. You need to clear what you need and also might want to give more details or like website so its easy to see if its worth it to collaborate with.

comments.author: Adigvcdh
comments.body: Quote from: vanturhan82 on November 21, 2023, 09:02:22 AMIf you're interested in collaboration, you can share some information about your project in your post. This way, people can see why they should connect with you via Telegram. Personally, I also need to see some appeal in the project before messaging you through Telegram. If it's just a collaboration in the usual investment field, there are many projects involving artificial intelligence out there that I find intriguing.I realize there are many projects using artificial intelligence. But Cogitex stands out for its plans to invest in AI and space exploration, including the creation of android robots. It's not just a project, it's a step into the future.

comments.author: Adigvcdh
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on November 21, 2023, 09:25:06 AMQuote from: Adigvcdh on November 20, 2023, 10:26:10 PMI am the author of an idea that I believe will revolutionize the future of cryptocurrencies and technology. The project I am working on is a combination of artificial intelligence, space exploration and blockchain. We are looking at opportunities for collaboration and partnership.Strategic partner meaning financially partner or someone who have experience too on developing project and codes. Partnetship is easy if you know what you want. There are lots of people here might be interested like in a form of marketing, investors or someone love to code and found buggy things on a platform. You need to clear what you need and also might want to give more details or like website so its easy to see if its worth it to collaborate with. I am looking for strategic partners willing to contribute to the Cogitex project. I am interested in those who can support not only financially, but also with their experience in development and coding. Partnering is a mutually beneficial process and I am willing to consider various forms of cooperation, be it marketing, investment or technical support.To clarify exactly what I'm looking for, I'll provide more details in a personal communication.

comments.author: jrrsparkles
comments.body: Quote from: Adigvcdh on November 21, 2023, 01:20:46 PMI am interested in those who can support not only financially, but also with their experience in development and coding. Partnering is a mutually beneficial process and I am willing to consider various forms of cooperation, be it marketing, investment or technical support.To clarify exactly what I'm looking for, I'll provide more details in a personal communication.You can also check out the Project Development section or move this thread to get better exposure for the one who might be the actual targetted audience for you.You also may need to express your idea a little bit and how its related to cryptocurrency to impress the people because its kind of hard to get picture from the project related to AI, space exploration and blockchain. Is this going to be the currency of the future when we make interplanetary roundtrips?

comments.author: GeorgeJohn
comments.body: Quote from: Adigvcdh on November 20, 2023, 10:26:10 PMI am the author of an idea that I believe will revolutionize the future of cryptocurrencies and technology. The project I am working on is a combination of artificial intelligence, space exploration and blockchain. We are looking at opportunities for collaboration and partnership.If you are passionate about the idea of the future, believe that technology should keep pace with progress, and are willing to share your experience and ideas, I am looking for partners willing to join our project.To contact me, write a message on the forum or in Telegram @di4xod.From my perspective I understand that what you are looking for is a financial partner, because what you are trying to make the combinations is already in existence on its segment, so therefore I believe that what you are saying so far is a good ideas but I taught that is something that will stand on it own without the combinations of something that is already in existence, I think that people that find your idea as a welcomed development will basically respond positively in this your thread

comments.author: Adigvcdh
comments.body: Quote from: jrrsparkles on November 21, 2023, 02:40:24 PMQuote from: Adigvcdh on November 21, 2023, 01:20:46 PMI am interested in those who can support not only financially, but also with their experience in development and coding. Partnering is a mutually beneficial process and I am willing to consider various forms of cooperation, be it marketing, investment or technical support.To clarify exactly what I'm looking for, I'll provide more details in a personal communication.You can also check out the Project Development section or move this thread to get better exposure for the one who might be the actual targetted audience for you.You also may need to express your idea a little bit and how its related to cryptocurrency to impress the people because its kind of hard to get picture from the project related to AI, space exploration and blockchain. Is this going to be the currency of the future when we make interplanetary roundtrips?When we talk about cryptocurrencies, we see more than just a medium of exchange. Cogitex is an amalgamation of blockchain, artificial intelligence and space research, making it more than just a unit of currency.We aim to create a sustainable ecosystem where technology will serve humanity by breaking new ground in research and enabling a new level of interaction with artificial intelligence. When our ambitious plans with space exploration become a reality, Cogitex could become the currency for future interplanetary transactions.

comments.author: Adigvcdh
comments.body: Quote from: GeorgeJohn on November 21, 2023, 03:01:17 PMQuote from: Adigvcdh on November 20, 2023, 10:26:10 PMI am the author of an idea that I believe will revolutionize the future of cryptocurrencies and technology. The project I am working on is a combination of artificial intelligence, space exploration and blockchain. We are looking at opportunities for collaboration and partnership.If you are passionate about the idea of the future, believe that technology should keep pace with progress, and are willing to share your experience and ideas, I am looking for partners willing to join our project.To contact me, write a message on the forum or in Telegram @di4xod.From my perspective I understand that what you are looking for is a financial partner, because what you are trying to make the combinations is already in existence on its segment, so therefore I believe that what you are saying so far is a good ideas but I taught that is something that will stand on it own without the combinations of something that is already in existence, I think that people that find your idea as a welcomed development will basically respond positively in this your thread I'm confident that as the discussion unfolds, those who resonate with the vision and potential impact of Cogitex will see the value beyond the surface. I invite everyone who sees this as a welcomed development to join the conversation and share their thoughts

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Adigvcdh on November 21, 2023, 05:14:39 PMWhen our ambitious plans with space exploration become a reality, Cogitex could become the currency for future interplanetary transactions.Your is truly out-of-this-world innovation but something is missing that shows your lack of transparency who are the people in your team involved in this project and what are your capabilities that you can materialize all your plans, for all we know you're just one guy who created a this idea Checking your team page I cannot see any of the team and checking one LinkedIn in your profile I don't see in your credentials that you can make this project take off.https://cogitex.org/#team

comments.author: Adigvcdh
comments.body: Quote from: robelneo on November 21, 2023, 09:46:26 PMQuote from: Adigvcdh on November 21, 2023, 05:14:39 PMWhen our ambitious plans with space exploration become a reality, Cogitex could become the currency for future interplanetary transactions.Your is truly out-of-this-world innovation but something is missing that shows your lack of transparency who are the people in your team involved in this project and what are your capabilities that you can materialize all your plans, for all we know you're just one guy who created a this idea Checking your team page I cannot see any of the team and checking one LinkedIn in your profile I don't see in your credentials that you can make this project take off.https://cogitex.org/#teamAll operations, including expenditures, transactions and development steps, are now publicized on social media platforms such as Twitter and Telegram. This is to ensure transparency and engagement in our community. My search for partners is aimed at joining forces in realizing this exciting idea.

comments.author: blckhawk
comments.created_time: November 22, 2023, 12:37:20 PMLast edit: November 22, 2023, 01:35:35 PM by blckhawk
comments.body: You need to outline your plan or your business model here OP, it is a big deal to many forum users that you are sharing everything that your potential business partner needs to know about the project, doing private messages will not work because other people cannot call out what you are doing which is a good thing so we can call out scams before they can even do anything shady, you know like nipping it in the bud.

comments.author: Adigvcdh
comments.body: Quote from: blckhawk on November 22, 2023, 12:37:20 PMYou need to outline your plan or your business model here OP, it's a big deal to many forum users that you are sharing everything that your potential business partner needs to know about the project, doing private messages will not work because other people cannot call out what you are doing which is a good thing so we can call out scams before they can even do anything shady, you know like nipping it in the bud.1. Introduction:Project description: Cogitex is an innovative platform combining artificial intelligence, space research and blockchain.Mission: Expanding the boundaries of human knowledge and developing future technologies.2. Market Analysis:Exploring the field of artificial intelligence, space research and blockchain technologies.Identification of potential competitors and partners.3. Products and Services:Development of integrated AI solutions for modern tasks.Organization of space expeditions financed through cryptocurrency.Creation and maintenance of an ecosystem for token utilization (CGTX) in various fields.4. Monetization model:Commissions for the use of AI services and transactions in the ecosystem.Participation in financing space projects based on cryptocurrency.Partnerships with companies using CGTX token.5. Marketing and Promotion:Building a strong brand around the idea of Cogitex.Active social media strategy with a focus on transparency and engagement.Organizing events and webinars to educate the community about the technology and capabilities of the project.6. Financial Plan:Raising investment through partnership agreements.Expenses for technology development, marketing, and space projects.Forecast of commission and transaction revenues.7. Risk analysis:Identifying potential risks associated with technical complexities, regulation, and changing market conditions.Development of risk mitigation strategies.8. Team:Gradual expansion of the team with experts in the fields of artificial intelligence, space research and blockchain technologies.Involvement of key employees with experience in successful projects.9. Development forecast:Plans to scale the project depending on technology development and changing market needs.Explore partnership opportunities with large organizations and governments.

comments.author: wallet4bitcoin
comments.body: Quote from: Adigvcdh on November 20, 2023, 10:26:10 PMI am the author of an idea that I believe will revolutionize the future of cryptocurrencies and technology. The project I am working on is a combination of artificial intelligence, space exploration and blockchain. We are looking at opportunities for collaboration and partnership.If you are passionate about the idea of the future, believe that technology should keep pace with progress, and are willing to share your experience and ideas, I am looking for partners willing to join our project.To contact me, write a message on the forum or in Telegram @di4xod.Before we hit telegram, let us hit the details a little bit. Stating a vague project and cutting across sensitive and trending spheres isn't conducive enough to attract investors, partners and contributors. It only makes us believe good things are lurking around such as good will.Be a little more elaborate about the project and lets get a feel of what being  a part of such solution will make us.

comments.author: Adigvcdh
comments.body: Quote from: wallet4bitcoin on December 17, 2023, 06:23:27 AMQuote from: Adigvcdh on November 20, 2023, 10:26:10 PMI am the author of an idea that I believe will revolutionize the future of cryptocurrencies and technology. The project I am working on is a combination of artificial intelligence, space exploration and blockchain. We are looking at opportunities for collaboration and partnership.If you are passionate about the idea of the future, believe that technology should keep pace with progress, and are willing to share your experience and ideas, I am looking for partners willing to join our project.To contact me, write a message on the forum or in Telegram @di4xod.Before we hit telegram, let us hit the details a little bit. Stating a vague project and cutting across sensitive and trending spheres isn't conducive enough to attract investors, partners and contributors. It only makes us believe good things are lurking around such as good will.Be a little more elaborate about the project and lets get a feel of what being  a part of such solution will make us.I realize that ideas about space exploration may seem ambitious at first glance. But our strategy is to move towards them gradually. Initially, the focus will be on artificial intelligence.Finding and Investing in AI: Our first step is to actively seek innovative AI and services. We will collaborate and invest in promising projects, taking the first steps in creating a sustainable ecosystem.Building Our Own Artificial Intelligence: We will develop and implement our own AI. This step will allow us to control and shape the technological base for future research and innovation.Services for CGTX Tokens: The scope of artificial intelligence and services will expand. All developed services and AI will be integrated into the ecosystem, providing their services in exchange for CGTX tokens.Our approach is to develop step by step, starting with a key area and gradually expand our horizons.

comments.author: WillyAp
comments.created_time: December 17, 2023, 10:07:50 PMLast edit: December 18, 2023, 11:56:32 AM by WillyAp
comments.body: First there is no AI on this planet just preprogrammed Answering services. What is angle with space exploration, you plan to rent a rocket? Who finances that? Too many buzzword, too little details. If it were serious there would be a website, a reserved domain at least. But no there is telegram.

comments.author: Adigvcdh
comments.body: Quote from: WillyAp on December 17, 2023, 10:07:50 PMFirst there is no AI on this planet just preprogrammed Ansering services. What is angle with space exploration, you plan to rent a rocket? Who finances that? Too many buzzword, too little details. If it were serious there would be a website, a reserved domain at least. But no there is telegram.The term "artificial intelligence" can be interpreted in various ways. In the context of Cogitex, we mean the development of programs capable of learning and self-improvement. Examples include machine learning systems, neural networks, and natural language processing algorithms.Space Exploration:At the moment, we do not plan to rent a rocket. Our concept is based on gradual development and partnerships. For example, we may collaborate with existing space agencies or companies to launch satellites for research and development purposes.Funding:The funding for our project is currently sourced from investments and the team's own resources. We are also exploring opportunities to attract external investors.Website and Domain:We fully understand your perspective regarding a website. The decision to use Telegram initially is driven by the desire to quickly interact with the community. However, we are actively working on creating a comprehensive web presence where all necessary details and resources will be provided.

comments.author: Vod
comments.body: Quote from: Adigvcdh on November 21, 2023, 01:14:16 PMIt's not just a project, it's a step into the future.I'm sorry, but it's not.  AI is a field that relies on tens of millions of dollars in daily research - you already missed the boat.   Any AI you develop will be replaced by a stronger AI; there will be no AI market.I cannot see any use for a blockchain in this scenario.   Why would one need to record these situations in a manner that cannot be overwritten?I have to agree with others - you are using trending buzzwords and don't have an actual plan.

comments.author: Adigvcdh
comments.body: Quote from: Vod on December 18, 2023, 02:12:00 AMQuote from: Adigvcdh on November 21, 2023, 01:14:16 PMIt's not just a project, it's a step into the future.I'm sorry, but it's not.  AI is a field that relies on tens of millions of dollars in daily research - you already missed the boat.   Any AI you develop will be replaced by a stronger AI; there will be no AI market.I cannot see any use for a blockchain in this scenario.   Why would one need to record these situations in a manner that cannot be overwritten?I have to agree with others - you are using trending buzzwords and don't have an actual plan.AI is a dynamic field, and we are convinced that the future in this area will be filled not only with replacements but also with additions. Each project in this field contributes to the overall progress.When we talk about developing our own AI within Cogitex, we aim to create unique algorithms and solutions that can find their own applications and become part of larger systems. Our goal is not just to create, but to integrate AI into various aspects of our project, including the services provided for CGTX tokens.Regarding the blockchain, we are keeping up with the concept of decentralization. A record on the blockchain provides transparency and immutability of data. In the context of Cogitex, this can be used to track and validate transactions, collaborate with AI and other aspects of the project. The ability to certify that data cannot be overwritten provides trust in the system.
